target_markets.market_description: Ambitious individuals trapped in unfulfilling employment who possess industry knowledge for entrepreneurship
target_markets.market_size_indicators: one in eight Americans have worked at McDonald's with 70% of employees learning transferable skills

target_markets.market_description: Fortune 500 executives and fast-growing startups needing AI transformation
pain_points: need to shift to AI-first company

problems_validated.problem: People need startup ideas but don't know where to find good ones
problems_validated.severity: High - affects ambitious individuals stuck in unfulfilling jobs
problems_validated.market_gap: Lack of data-backed startup ideas delivered systematically

products_tools.name: Perplexity Labs
products_tools.use_case: AI agents for various business functions including film direction, sales, copywriting, social media
products_tools.metrics: Perplexity is a $13 billion search engine company

products_tools.name: ideabrowser.com
products_tools.use_case: Provides daily startup ideas backed by data trends
products_tools.pricing: free plan available with paid upgrades

business_strategies.strategy: Use AI agents to identify trends and deliver startup ideas as a service
business_strategies.implementation: AI agents search for what people are looking for and screaming for in terms of products, then deliver ideas via email
business_strategies.expected_results: Daily engagement with entrepreneurs seeking startup ideas

business_strategies.strategy: Create viral content using AI-generated storyboards and thumbnails
business_strategies.implementation: Use Perplexity Labs to create storyboards, then convert to YouTube thumbnails and social content
business_strategies.expected_results: High view counts through short film-style ads

problems_solutions.problem: Creating professional film content without expensive video agencies
problems_solutions.solution: Use Perplexity Labs to generate storyboards, screenplays, and visual concepts
steps: Use generated assets in video creation tools

problems_solutions.problem: Finding potential customers and their contact information
problems_solutions.solution: Use Perplexity Labs to create customer prospect lists with contact details
steps: Get list of 20+ companies with contact info

startup_ideas.target_market: Ambitious individuals in unfulfilling jobs who want to start businesses
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Lack of validated, data-backed startup ideas
startup_ideas.business_model: Freemium - free daily ideas with paid plans for more features and AI agents
startup_ideas.validation: Use AI agents to search for market demand signals

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Spending hundreds of thousands on video agencies for marketing content
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Unnecessary high costs for content creation
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Use AI tools like Perplexity Labs to generate professional storyboards and concepts first
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Instead of hiring expensive video agency, use AI to create 8-minute film ad concept

growth_tactics.tactic: Create short film-style ads that get high view counts
steps: Develop compelling story around target demographic
growth_tactics.cost_estimate: significantly less than $100,000 video agency costs

growth_tactics.tactic: Use AI-generated storyboards as YouTube thumbnails and social content

steps: Prompt for film concept with specific demographics

metrics_kpis.benchmark: 70% of McDonald's employees learn transferable skills

trends_signals.trend: Era of the idea guy according to Sam Altman
trends_signals.opportunity: Incredible time to be building a startup

trends_signals.trend: AI agents replacing traditional business functions
trends_signals.opportunity: Replace salespeople, copywriters, social media leads, film directors, financial analysts with AI

actionable_quotes.quote: Sam Alman, the co-founder of OpenAI, just said that it is the era of the idea guy, and he is not wrong. I think that right now is an incredible time to be building a startup.

I thought that I was going to do this episode on Perplexity Labs and be like, it's not that good. And I even texted the CEO of Perplexity, Arvin, and I was like, you should come and showcase it. He never responded. Um and I once I saw this I was like wow this is incredible.
actionable_quotes.context: Initial skepticism turned to amazement about Perplexity Labs capabilities
actionable_quotes.actionability: Test tools thoroughly before making judgments
